channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scoop: Biden world explodes at Kamala Harris' new book
item.description: Former aides to Joe Biden reacted with rage Wednesday to an excerpt from Kamala Harris' upcoming book in which she said the ex-president was "reckless...

item.title: Manhunt underway in Charlie Kirk killing after 2nd suspect released
item.description: Police are searching for the shooter in Wednesday's killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk after a second suspect was released, per an email fr...

item.title: Trump demanded Netanyahu commit not to strike Qatar again
item.description: President Trump demanded a commitment from Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu not to strike Qatar again after the attack against Hamas leaders ...

item.title: Charlie Kirk killing deepens America's violent spiral
item.description: The heinous killing of Charlie Kirk shocked the nation's conscience at a moment of searing political tension. In an Oval Office address, President Tru...

item.title: Mars rock contains "clearest sign" yet of potential past life on Red Planet
item.description: NASA's Perseverance Mars has uncovered unusual features in rocks that suggest there may have once been life on the Red Planet , according to a new stu...

item.title: House passes $892.6 billion defense bill over Democrats’ protests
item.description: The vote, mostly along party lines, lost Democratic support as the GOP rebuffed efforts to rein in President Donald Trump’s domestic military agenda.

item.title: At a Capitol Hill church, mourners gather at a vigil for Charlie Kirk
item.description: More than 150 people gathered to remember the conservative political figure, who was fatally shot during a campus event.

item.title: In Trump’s White House, Charlie Kirk’s killing is deeply personal
item.description: The conservative founder of Turning Point USA animated a generation of young activists and was on a first-name basis with most of the West Wing.

item.title: Charlie Kirk, fiery voice in conservative politics, killed at 31
item.description: Charlie Kirk, 31, built one of the most influential organizations on the right, turning viral debate moments into fuel for Turning Point’s rapid growt...

item.title: Trump administration will resume plans for federal charity drive
item.description: The move comes after pushback from charities who had opposed ending the longstanding tradition of charitable giving from the federal workforce.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
